name: Easy Spanish Rice
author: Arizona Desert Flower
summary: This recipe has been told to me by my girlfriends MIL from Mexico. I had to measure the ingredients. Never before have they been measured, always a 'handful of this and equal parts of this' until it looked right. I hope you enjoy it. It has become a family favorite in our home. I am always asked to make it!
ingredients: ¾ cup chopped fresh cilantro, or more to taste
1 tablespoon tomato bouillon with chicken flavoring (such as Knorr®), or more to taste
directions: Place a pot over medium-heat heat; add oil and heat until oil shimmers slightly
Pour rice into the hot oil, stirring constantly, until rice is golden to dark brown, about 5 minutes
Mix water, tomatoes, onion, cilantro, and bouillon into rice
Turn off heat and cover pot tightly with a lid
Leave pot covered on hot burner until rice has absorbed all the liquid, about 20 minutes
